reviewText: Movies... you like 'em or you don't. This set had something in it that a few people would enjoy. A good mix of movies for my need.

Bought for me. 4 Movies in one.
What a great idea!
Brand new it was sealed.
Very entertaining for both me and my Grandchildren!
This is worth it for "Trading Places" alone. I like "Surviving Christmas" too and the others were okay. Recommend for value too.

I love three of the four movies! 'All I want for Christmas' was annoying to me and I didn't finish watching it. The other 3 are keepers! I love them. Its well worth the price and nice to have collections available. 'Surviving Christmas' was new to me this year and is now a favorite! Too funny! 'Trading Places' has been a long time favorite, and 'Last Holiday' is a newer favorite, but a movie I watch about every other month, year round!!!
movies are crisp, clear, and most of all bundled, which makes it a bit eaiser to store, look forward to purchase more

I have enjoyed these movies and plan to watched them over and over throughout the Christmas Season. Nothing's better than a funny movie to brighten the Holidays! Hope you enjoy them as much as I have.
Sets like these are great because they take up less space and easy to find all the great movies at one grab. My wife loves all these movies.

I had fallen in love with the yearly showing of All I Want for Christmas as well as Last Holiday.  To find them and the classic Trading Places and a newly acquired favorite of Surviving Christmas all in one set more than satisfied mine and my daughter's yearly tradition of a Christmas DVD for a gift!
Love this collection stretches from 80s 90s and 00
Great movies to get you in the Christmas spirit! My favorite Christmas movie of all time is Surviving Christmas and the rest of them are a fantastic bonus!
Good value and the quality is par for dvd
i haven't watched these movies yet, but i loaned out the movies to others, and they saisd the movies were very funny and excellent movies
4 Christmas movies in 1 box.  How can you go wrong?!
Great deal with four disc. Ready for the holidays season this year.
